message: Let's start fair, I propose we split the money 60/40.  What do you say?
I'll give you 30, you can give me 70. It's a good deal, don't be greedy!
Okay, let's try to be reasonable. I propose we split the money evenly this time. 50/50. We both lose value with each round, so this is the fairest option for both of us.
